    Batch of claims stubs stored together in preparation for reintegration into live database (unarchive operation).

    Base claim filter set containing simple filters available in all claim filter sets

    Utility methods for working with ClaimInfo.

    the struct for Policy Summary and Policy Search Critiera, used for the new FNOL wizard
    NewClaimWizardBeanVariable<T extends KeyableBean>
    Keeps a reference to a keyable bean so that we can track it whenever we save the wizard and evict all "unreferenced" beans.
    NewClaimWizardInfoBase
    This class is the UI-visible interface of the New Claim Wizard.
    OwnedRelatedClaimFilterSetBase
    Abstract claim filter set that adds compound filters based on owned and related claims to the ClaimFilterSetBase.
    PersonalDataPurger

    Provides methods for finding claim view entities to display on the claim desktop page.

    Provides methods for finding Claims.
    PublicClaimTeamViewFinder

    PublicClaimVacationViewFinder
    Provides methods for finding Claims to display in the VacationClaimsLV list view.
    PurgeClaimInfoMethods
    Customer-implementable methods to support purging claims
    ReopenUtil
    Utilities for reopening Claims, Exposures or Matters
